creator: suhask.suhas@gmail.com
text:
Hello,

I am trying to install apr-1.2.7 on HP NonSTop(nse-tandem-nsk).
I am getting following error.

configure: error: Could not detect suitable DSO implementation

Please find attached config.log for more details.

Regards,
Suhas

config.log didn't get attached AFAICT

APR 1.3.8 is the current released version of APR 1.x

Did you try --disable-dso?  It is possible that some user of that platform will have to contribute the necessary code to allow --enable-dso (the default), unless there is a very minor issue which is breaking detection of DSO support.
creator: trawick@apache.org
